name: Hack You!
description:
Global Game Jam 2022 Page

The famous HI-TECH companies Doors and Pears are fighting against each other to win the race and become the leader corporation in the world! 

You, the company developer, must defend your servers against hacking attack. 

The other company is sending some nasty viruses and you have to counter-attack them. Lead the company to the victory! 

Or lose your job, forever. 

Hack You! Is a multiplayer 1v1 platformer and tower defence competitive game.

Fight against other players and reach the victory! 

Your goal is to protect your server from viruses. Dash them using spacebar to kill and to counter-attack your opponent! 

Use A and D to move, W to jump and S to move down platform.

But take care, each time you Dash a virus it will become faster than before!

Controller supported.
